Aquaman bụ dike na-apụta na akwụkwọ egwu egwu America nke DC Comics bipụtara

Ndị Paul Norris na Mort Weisinger mebere, agwa arụpụtara na More Fun Comics #73 (November 1941).  Na mbido ihe nkwado ndabere na mpaghara aha anthology nke DC, Aquaman mechara nwee kpakpando n'ọtụtụ mpịakọta nke usoro akwụkwọ ọchị ọchị
N'ime ngwụcha 1950s na 1960s superhero-revival oge nke a maara dị ka Silver Age, ọ bụ onye guzobere otu ọgbakọ ikpe ziri ezi

Na 1990s Modern Age, ndị ode akwụkwọ tụgharịrị àgwà Aquaman nke ọma, na akụkọ akụkọ na-egosi ịdị arọ nke ọrụ ya dị ka eze Atlantis.  Ndị ọjọọ Aquaman gụnyere onye iro ya bụ Black Manta na nwanne ya nwoke nke Ocean Master, n'etiti ndị ọzọ.￼
